title: 16-hour water cut in Colombo
body_lines: The water supply has been interrupted for 16 hours from now onwards for several areas in Colombo due to improvement work of pipelines, the National Water Supply & Drainage Board (NWSDB) said.

A 16-hour water cut will be in place in several areas in Colombo on Saturday (18) from 11.00 pm to 3.00 pm on Sunday (19) due to essential distribution network improvement work, the National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWSDB) said
Accordingly, the water supply would be supply in in Colombo 05 and 06 areas.
